i18n.title: Value Is Nil
i18n.description: In this lab, we will delve into the concept of checking if a specified value is null or undefined. We will explore the isNil() function, which makes use of the strict equality operator to perform the check, and we will see how it can be used in practical scenarios to improve the reliability and robustness of our code.

meta.title: Mastering Null and Undefined in JavaScript
meta.description: Explore the concept of checking for null and undefined values in JavaScript, and learn how to use the isNil() function for reliable code.
meta.keywords: javascript, null, undefined, javascript practice, javascript practice online, javascript lab, javascript tutor, programming, isnil
